title: Cloud-Native IaC vs Cloud-Agnostic IaC
description: Comparing infrastructure-as-code strategies: leveraging cloud-specific services for optimization versus maintaining portability across providers, and when each approach makes sense

title: Spec-Driven and Test-Driven Code Generation
description: Exploring how AI code generation tools transform development workflows when paired with specifications and test suites, and the architectural implications of treating code as ephemeral
